channel.title: Track service deployed time
channel.description:
From @krhubert https://github.com/mesg-foundation/core/issues/359
What do you think of that? Should we track those values and display it? Also short description would be nice (what does the service do ...) for investigation/debugging.
---
Reply from @ilgooz
yes, we can show them with list command? like docker ps/service ls
